admitCards.title: BPSC 71th Pre Exam Date 2025
admitCards.brief: BPSC has released the Pre Exam Date for the 71th Pre Exam 2025. The exam will be conducted on 13 September 2025. Candidates can check their Exam Date and download their Admit Card (when available) from the official website.

posts.name: Various Posts under 71th Pre
posts.eligibility: Graduation degree in any stream from any recognized university.

posts.name: Financial Administrative Officer
posts.eligibility: Graduation degree in Commerce, Economics, Mathematics, or Statistics.

posts.name: Deputy Superintendent of Police (DSP)
posts.eligibility: Graduation degree in any stream from any recognized university.

howToDownload: Search for the '71st Combined Competitive (Preliminary) Examination' notification.
Click to open and download the PDF for your records.
Admit Cards will be released in the same section before the exam.
